title: UAE Emirates bullish on Tadej Pogačar hitting Tour de France form: ‘We remain very optimistic’
content:
Team performance chief lifts lid on Pogačar's physiological prowess: 'His big strength is his ability to recover and adapt.'

Read the full article at UAE Emirates bullish on Tadej Pogačar hitting Tour de France form: ‘We remain very optimistic’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
